metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27793 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An off-by-one overflow flaw was found in radare2 due to mismatched array length in core_java.c. This could allow an attacker to cause a crash, and perform a denail of service attack.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
